\begin{cvSection}{Experience}

\begin{cvEvent}{Co-founder, CTO}{Lightform}{2014-Present}
\cvEventBullet{{\bf Company highlights}:}
\cvEventBulletSub{Delivered multiple AR products from conception to shipping, including the first all-in-one AR projector}
\cvEventBulletSub{Developed the most consumer-friendly projected AR software on the market today}
\cvEventBulletSub{Patented novel research, including core company IP and a smart-home projection device}
\cvEventBulletSub{Acquired 11,000+ customers in two years since Lightform's first hardware product release}
\cvEventBullet{As an {\bf executive}, defined company vision, direction, and culture:}
\cvEventBulletSub{Responsible for company technical decisions and deadlines}
\cvEventBulletSub{Directed the development of Lightform's IP portfolio}
\cvEventBulletSub{Voting member of the board of directors}
\cvEventBullet{As an {\bf engineering manager}, supervised projects with various team sizes and experience levels:}
\cvEventBulletSub{Engaged regularly with customers, analytics and stakeholders to define and revise product roadmap}
\cvEventBulletSub{Promoted exceptional team members into leadership roles for new product initiatives}
\cvEventBulletSub{Shipped new products annually while maintaining legacy product compatibility for existing customers}
\cvEventBulletSub{Installed processes and implemented scrum practices for iterative development}
\cvEventBullet{As a {\bf research engineer}, developed and patented proprietary algorithms:}
\cvEventBulletSub{A structured light technique using low-cost hardware, tolerant to harsh conditions}
\cvEventBulletSub{Automatic alignment and re-alignment techniques for projected AR}
\cvEventBulletSub{Negative space detection and automatic perspective warping for projection}
\cvEventBullet{As a {\bf software engineer}, contributed multi-platform production code in use by customers:}
\cvEventBulletSub{Developed and maintained the application layer running on Lightform devices}
\cvEventBulletSub{Implemented graphics/UI/network components and infrastructure for Lightform desktop software}
\cvEventBulletSub{Regularly contributed features and patches across all Lightform products}
\cvEventBulletSub{Performed regular code reviews and mentored junior developers}
\end{cvEvent}

\begin{cvEvent}{Computer Vision Engineer}{Lumenco}{2012-2014}
